name: URBAN DREAMBOG
description:
A short (~15 minute) walking sim in a dream like urban environment. Created with Raycast Game Maker 5.

Features:

  • No installation needed
  • MS-DOS style 3D graphics
  • Electro soundtrack by https://soundcloud.com/stromproduktion and  https://soundcloud.com/dx4-100. Completely safe to stream on Twitch and Youtube!
  • You can pet the dogs and cats
  • A secret area to explore? For sure!

Controls:

  • Move: arrow key
  • Open: e
  • Use hand: left ctrl.
